boardgame.name: Sobek
boardgame.description: From the Publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Spring/Summer 2010_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Pitch: Ancient Egypt... The temple of Sobek is being built and the market place is thriving. Loads of goods arrive by ship for the construction site and it is a race to pick the best items in order to sell them with the most profit._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Of course, with so much at stake, not all the moves are legal, corruption is everywhere and cordiality scarce. Because in the end there can be only one winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;---_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Famous Bruno Cathala's (Cyclades, Dice Town, Shadows Over Camelot, Mr. Jack, MOW...) latest design is a fast paced card game well suited for the whole family, with tactical choices, luck, and a bit of cunning._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn you have to choose if you want to take a goods card, play a character with a special power or display a set of matching goods cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While taking a profitable card, you often collect corruption points, which add up in a pile in front of you. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;During each each round five sets of nine cards are put at the players' disposal. When all cards are gone, there is a scoring for all displayed cards, but beware, the player with the most corruption sigils sees his income almost cut down in half._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends after 3 rounds or if a player has reached a hundred points._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Podcast EP09 – Jeux « Filler » et Café l’Aléa

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Asmodée (ASM SOB01) Trading and corruption on the Nile! Sobek is a fast paced card game for 2-4 players. Visit the market to buy goods then sell them for a profit, but be aware...some of the more desirable goods are so desirable that you may have to take corruption points to get them...get too many corruption points, and you could lose most of your financial empire!

Asmodée (ASM SOB01) Trading and corruption on the Nile! Sobek is a fast paced card game for 2-4 players. Visit the market to buy goods then sell them for a profit, but be aware...some of the more desirable goods are so desirable that you may have to take corruption points to get them...get too many corruption points, and you could lose most of your financial empire!
Never played!

Trading and corruption on the Nile! Sobek is a fast paced card game for 2-4 players. Visit the market to buy goods then sell them for a profit, but be aware...some of the more desirable goods are so desirable that you may have to take corruption points to get them...get too many corruption points, and you could lose most of your financial empire!

Asmodee (ASM SOB01) Trading and corruption on the Nile! Sobek is a fast paced card game for 2-4 players. Visit the market to buy goods then sell them for a profit, but be aware...some of the more desirable goods are so desirable that you may have to take corruption points to get them...get too many corruption points, and you could lose most of your financial empire!

Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.

New in shrink wrap. Canadians will be charge applicable taxes. Orders will be processed the same day and shipped by expedited parcel. You will be charged exact shipping plus $2 for packing material. Shipped from N2B 1J4. Local pickups welcome. We ship worldwide. Orders may be combined and orders over $150 will be shipped in Canada free or in the US for a $10 flat fee. Orders must be placed at the same time. We ship the day we receive payment!!! We will reduce shipping cost on international orders by $10 if the order is over $150. We currently only accept PayPal. Our prices are always 30% or more off US MRSP.
